name: South Carolina Mentor Inc.

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: South Carolina Mentor Inc. is a Community Based Residential Treatment Facility  Mental Illness provider based in Columbia, SC. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $54.8M in Medicaid payments across 404K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $54.8M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
